description: The course consists of a detailed study of the Integrated Planning Act, 1997 including the Integrated Development Assessment System (IDAS) established under the Act. Specific topics include the role and legal status of plans, the centrality of environmental concerns and the jurisdiction of the Planning and Environment Court.
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs.
